availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert G. Potter (Clay County, Kentucky, captain.)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, captain. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Potter on October 17, 1865. Served as Captain in the Twenty-Fourth Kentucky Infantry from July 21, 1862 to January 25, 1863.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-1378
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film #001904623, p. 678.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, p. 171A.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 186.
